protein.specific_function: This enzyme condenses acetyl-CoA with acetoacetyl-CoA to form HMG-CoA, which is the substrate for HMG-CoA reductase.

pathway.name: Synthesis and degradation of ketone bodies

go_class.description: transferase activity, transferring acyl groups, acyl groups converted into alkyl on transfer
cellular response to follicle-stimulating hormone stimulus
response to low light intensity stimulus
